Serialized Form

  • Package org.Display

    • Class org.Display.Screen

      class Screen extends JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • collisionDetector
          CollisionDetector collisionDetector
          Handles collisions between player and tiles as well as player and immovable objects.
        • elapsedTime
          long elapsedTime
          How long has passed since the game started, in milliseconds.
        • enemies
          ArrayList<Enemy> enemies
          List containing all snake enemies.
        • FPS
          int FPS
          Number of frames per second our game runs at.
        • gameOver
          int gameOver
          Indicates whether the player has lost the game.
        • gameOverMenu
          GameOverMenu gameOverMenu
        • gameState
          int gameState
          Toggles between game state and menu state.
        • gameThread
          Thread gameThread
          Main game loop thread. As long as the thread is running, the game runs.
        • gameTiles
          TileManager gameTiles
          Holds all information about the game tiles.
        • menuLogic
          MenuLogic menuLogic
          Contains all logic in reference to starting, winning, and losing menus.
        • objDisplayer
          ImmovableObjectDisplay objDisplayer
          Populates objects[] with the corresponding objects.
        • objects
          ImmovableObject[] objects
          Array containing all possible immovable objects in our game. Display up to 10 carrots, 1 mystical ocean fruit, and 6 lava at one time
        • player
          MainCharacter player
          Main character of our game, a turtle.
        • playerInput
          KeyHandler playerInput
          Takes player input via WASD keys or arrow keys, in order to facilitate main character movement.
        • score
          int score
          Current score of player where they receive 1 points for collecting a carrot, 3 for a mystical ocean fruit, and lose 3 for touching lava.
        • scoreFont
          Font scoreFont
          Font for any score information displayed on the screen.
        • screenColumns
          int screenColumns
          Number of columns of our game screen.
        • screenHeight
          int screenHeight
          Height of our game screen in pixels.
        • screenRows
          int screenRows
          Number of rows of our game screen.
        • screenWidth
          int screenWidth
          Width of our game screen in pixels.
        • startTime
          long startTime
          Time at which the game started, in milliseconds.
        • tileSize
          int tileSize
          The size of the length and width of each tile of our game in pixels.
        • timerFont
          Font timerFont
          Font for any timer information displayed on the screen.
        • winningMenu
          WinningMenu winningMenu

      class WinningMenu extends Menu implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields
